cab.content: From Viceroy, Foreign Department, ili/i June 1919. (Received 19tb June, 2 p.m.)854 S. Secret. Afghanistan. Your telegram of 4th instant. Reference in North-West Frontier Diary is to demand for a crore and 17 lakhs of rupees made by Habibulla just before his death (vide my telegram dated 25th February).We have received no application from Amanulla for payment of any (? portion of) subsidy.
